title: Babygogo Parenting - Baby Care & Pregnancy Tips
description:
From pregnancy to support for parents with school goers, we provide support for parents end to end. Ask yours and your baby’s medical questions to doctors live on the app, track your child’s growth with our growth chart, set vaccination reminders and store medical documents using Babygogo!
We also have 1000+ short, easily readable parenting articles that cover every possible parenting issues along with useful videos and graphics.
What can you do on the Babygogo App?
a) Interact with the community, read, watch and write
You can talk to doctors and experts about yours and your baby's health anytime you want for free. Our strong community of parents are here as a support group to help you through the challenges of parenting - be it regarding baby care or guidance and comfort for you.
We understand the length and depths of the parenting challenges you face and hence have created 1000+ articles, albums and videos on baby care, baby development & baby food and immediate answers to all your baby health questions.
We have an extensive list of articles and videos on baby food including food charts and nutritious recipes for weaning babies to school-goers. Our community also has parenting experts who conduct highly interactive weekly sessions that are beneficial for mommies and children!
Our growth tracker helps you track the growth of your child and with our vaccination tracker and medical records tracker you can always be on top of your child’s health and development.
Baby Care
Breastfeeding tips - Do’s, don’ts and myths

Preparing for delivery
Post-pregnancy care
Express yourself, your ideas, experiences, recipes, stories etc. by using our articles feature. If you love helping others with parenting, answer our questions to win golden badges and to get featured on the app!
b) Track Growth, Set Reminders and Store Medical Reports
You are a busy parent who wants to stay on top of it all and we know that. Now you can track your baby's growth, set reminders for vaccinations and store prescriptions, lab reports and scan images all in one place with our app.
Features:
• Q&A - Ask your questions to Doctors & other Experienced Parents anonymously
• Articles - Read & explore best articles on Parenting, Baby Health & Food Recipes.
• Videos - Watch engaging Baby Videos on Babycare & Baby food.
• Albums - See useful picture charts on Food, Baby sleep, and other baby care topics.
• Baby Growth Tracker - Track your baby's height & weight as per the age.
• Regular Contests – Participate in exciting contests & win gifts.
• Support Group - Daily discussions on parenting topics be it pregnancy, parenting, baby care tips, parenting applications, baby milestones, family dynamics, postpartum issues, adoption, gender discrimination, etc.
Download now to get started!
